headline: Fair Isaac: Hold Rating Amid Margin Strength And Regulatory Risks
summary: Fair Isaac's strong margin power is balanced by regulatory and mortgage risks. Platform ARR growth and pricing power support high margins, See more on FICO here.

headline: Buy Now, Pay Later Loans Set To Factor Into Consumer FICO Scores
summary: The new development will either be a plus or a loss for consumers dealing with credit issues.

headline: FICO scores to include buy-now-pay-later loans
summary: Shoppers who use buy now lay later loans will now have their payments, or missed payments, included in their FICO scores. FOX 26 Consumer Reporter Heather Sullivan breaks down what to know.
